attributes.action: Extend the right to buy discount before the 2024 changes
attributes.additional_details: The changes that have been made have left some people without the means to financially afford to purchase their homes which some have lived and payed rent for 25 years 30 years or more but wasn't notified via any letter to state any changes were to be put in place, surely this should be part of the tenancy agreement to give one months notice by letter about any significant changes that will be put in place.
attributes.background: Extend the right to buy scheme at previous discount pricing before they changed in November 2024

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Bring back full Right to buy discount & give notice of future changes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726223
